title: Netflix Sinks as Concerns Mount Over Risks of Warner Bros. Deal
description: Netflix Inc. investors were already skeptical about its $72 billion deal for Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. Now the threat of having to pay even more and potentially face a protracted regulatory fight is making matters worse.
content: Netflix Inc. investors were already skeptical about its $72 billion deal for Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. Now the threat of having to pay even more and potentially face a protracted regulatory fight is making matters worse.
